itunes:title: #8: Letting Others In (The How To's & Roadblocks)
title: #8: Letting Others In (The How To's & Roadblocks)
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Letting others in is hard. We can be afraid of being hurt, let down, or made to look foolish. It's also hard to determine who are the right people to let in, if any at all.  In this episode, we dig into what gets in the way of letting others in, how...
itunes:summary:
Letting others in is hard. We can be afraid of being hurt, let down, or made to look foolish. It's also hard to determine who are the right people to let in, if any at all.


In this episode, we dig into what gets in the way of letting others in, how we may be the main ones who stop it, and next steps we can take to get better. 

Take Our Free Masterclass:
How to Fix Your Internal Magnet: The 6 Step Method to Stop Attracting and Obsessing About Unavailable Partners to Get the Love You Deserve
